TI: [Responses of neurons of the dorsal hippocampus to low-frequency photostimulation].
AB: The spontaneous activity and evoked responses of the CA-1 and CA-3 hippocampal neurons to single and low frequency light flashes revealed in adult unanesthetized immobilized cats neurons seemingly indifferent to light flashes and neurons sensitive to visual stimulation: some of them changed their spontaneous activity, others generated "specific" response consisting of early phasic and late tonic components, or only phasic components of various complexity.
TT: Reaktsiia neironov dorsal'nogo gippokampa v usloviiakh nizkochastotnoi fotostimuliatsii.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1981 May;67(5):645-51.
